issue.title: Lower real time factor since the update

content.raw: This is a pretty serious issue, and I'm hoping it'll get more attention. We are allowed 3.5 hours of sim time per run; with an RTF of 0.13, it takes 27 hours to practice a full run, which is wholly impractical. In addition, for the competition we will only be allowed a 24-hour real-time window to complete five runs, which would require an RTF of no less than 0.73. Is that amount of performance improvement feasible? When might we expect it to be available?
content.html: This is a pretty serious issue, and I'm hoping it'll get more attention. We are allowed 3.5 hours of sim time per run; with an RTF of 0.13, it takes 27 hours to practice a full run, which is wholly impractical. In addition, for the competition we will only be allowed a 24-hour real-time window to complete five runs, which would require an RTF of no less than 0.73. Is that amount of performance improvement feasible? When might we expect it to be available?
